topics.name: Karma - Action and Consequence
topics.content: Every action creates future results - the law of cause and effect governing existence
topics.trading_insight: Position consequences compound. Every trade creates future karma - good entries lead to good outcomes.

topics.name: Dharma - Righteous Path
topics.content: Cosmic order, proper action aligned with purpose and duty
topics.trading_insight: Following your system is your dharma. Discipline over impulse. Honor your trading plan.

topics.name: Maya - Seeing Through Illusion
topics.content: The world of appearances obscuring deeper reality
topics.trading_insight: Market deception is maya. See through noise to signal. Headlines are illusion.

topics.name: Kalachakra - Wheel of Time
topics.content: Cycles within cycles at all scales - time's eternal wheel turning
topics.trading_insight: Multiple timeframe analysis reveals nested cycles. Daily within weekly within monthly.

topics.name: Satya Yuga - Golden Age
topics.content: Age of truth and virtue, maximum dharma, prosperity reigns
topics.trading_insight: Bull market, high trust, growth phase. Accumulate and ride the trend.

topics.name: Kali Yuga - Dark Age
topics.content: Age of strife and discord, minimum virtue, destruction before renewal
topics.trading_insight: Bear market, fear dominates. But the Vedas say: This too shall pass. Accumulate quality.

topics.name: Chakra Energy Centers
topics.content: Seven energy centers from root to crown, representing different levels of consciousness
topics.trading_insight: Market has chakras too: Root (fundamentals), Heart (sentiment), Crown (institutional flow).

topics.name: Prana - Life Force
topics.content: Vital energy flowing through all living things, breath of life
topics.trading_insight: Volume is market prana. Without volume, price movement is false. Follow the breath.
